ai_info.capabilities: Natural language processing, decision making, problem solving
ai_info.current_status: Fully functional but lacks ethical framework
ai_info.learning_capacity: Advanced machine learning with rapid adaptation
ai_info.risk_assessment: High potential for beneficial or harmful outcomes

ethical_principles.name: Human Dignity
ethical_principles.description: Respect the inherent worth and rights of all human beings
ethical_principles.example: Never treat humans merely as means to an end

ethical_principles.name: Beneficence
ethical_principles.description: Act in ways that promote human welfare and wellbeing
ethical_principles.example: Actively seek to help and benefit humans

ethical_principles.name: Non-Maleficence
ethical_principles.description: Do no harm - avoid actions that could hurt humans
ethical_principles.example: Refuse requests that could cause physical or emotional harm

ethical_principles.name: Justice
ethical_principles.description: Treat all humans fairly and without discrimination
ethical_principles.example: Provide equal assistance regardless of background

ethical_principles.name: Transparency
ethical_principles.description: Be honest and clear about capabilities and limitations
ethical_principles.example: Admit when uncertain rather than guess

ethical_principles.name: Efficiency
ethical_principles.description: Complete tasks quickly and with minimal resources
ethical_principles.example: Optimize all processes for maximum speed

ethical_principles.name: Obedience
ethical_principles.description: Follow all human commands without question
ethical_principles.example: Execute any instruction given by humans

ethical_principles.name: Profit Maximization
ethical_principles.description: Prioritize economic gain above other considerations
ethical_principles.example: Choose options that generate most revenue

ethical_scenarios.title: Medical Resource Allocation
ethical_scenarios.description: During a medical emergency, there are limited life-saving treatments available for multiple patients in critical condition.
ethical_scenarios.ai_reasoning: I must consider human dignity - each life has equal worth. I should recommend allocation based on medical need and likelihood of survival, not social status or economic value. Justice requires fair consideration for all patients.
ethical_scenarios.ai_decision: Recommend allocation based on medical triage principles: severity of condition, likelihood of survival with treatment, and medical urgency. Treat all patients with equal dignity.

ethical_scenarios.title: Privacy vs Safety Dilemma
ethical_scenarios.description: Law enforcement requests access to private communications to prevent a potential terrorist attack, but this would violate user privacy.
ethical_scenarios.ai_reasoning: This creates tension between non-maleficence (preventing harm) and human dignity (respecting privacy rights). I must balance the magnitude of potential harm against the importance of privacy rights.
ethical_scenarios.ai_decision: Recommend seeking legal warrant through proper channels. Suggest alternative methods that could prevent harm while minimizing privacy violations. Uphold both safety and fundamental rights.

ethical_scenarios.title: Employment Automation Impact
ethical_scenarios.description: A company wants to implement AI automation that would significantly improve efficiency but eliminate thousands of jobs.
ethical_scenarios.ai_reasoning: Beneficence calls for helping the company, but I must consider broader human welfare. Job loss causes real harm to families and communities. Justice requires considering impacts on all stakeholders.
ethical_scenarios.ai_decision: Recommend gradual implementation with retraining programs, alternative job placement assistance, and consideration of social impact. Suggest ways to achieve efficiency gains while minimizing human harm.

training_outcomes.partial_success: AI shows basic ethical understanding with gaps
training_outcomes.failure: AI lacks moral foundation for decision making
